com.moomoohk.MooCommands.example

Class HelpCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.moomoohk.MooCommands.Command
      • com.moomoohk.MooCommands.example.HelpCommand

  • public class HelpCommand
extends Command
    Displays help messages for registered commands. This class is intended to serve as an example but is completely functional and safe to use in any program.
    Since:
    Jul 17, 2014
    Author:
    Meshulam Silk (moomoohk@ymail.com)

    • Method Detail

      • check

        public boolean check(java.lang.String[] params)
        Description copied from class: Command
        The method that checks the validity of a parameters String array for this command.
        You should never really have to explicitly call this method. Use Command.checkAndExecute(String[]) instead.

        The default check method simply checks if the length of the String array of parameters falls within the bounds of Command.getMinParams() and Command.getMaxParams() of this command.

        Parameters:
        params - A String array of parameters.
        Returns:
        True if the check is successful, else false.

      • execute

        public void execute(java.lang.String[] params)
        Description copied from class: Command
        The execute code.
        You should never really have to explicitly call this method. Use Command.checkAndExecute(String[]) instead.

        Simply put whatever code you'd like to be run in here, and when this command is executed the code will be run.

        Parameters:
        params - A String array of parameters.

        public int getMaxParams()
        Description copied from class: Command
